department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time...
description: AMENDMENT TO CLOSING TIME: Please disregard the Ariba Discovery posting response deadline closing time and Buyandsell posting closing time. All required supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted on February 24, 2023 by 02:00PM EST. All bids submitted after 02:00PM EST will result in the bid being declared non-responsive.
